roleset.name: cover with water, overwhelm, inundated

example.name: intransitive
example.text: `` The Giants got swamped in the second game , 100 , and trailed 4 - 1 going into the bottom of the ninth of the third and deciding game .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Last year , when the rising Orange River threatened to swamp the course , the same engineers who are pushing back the Atlantic rushed to build a wall to hold back the flood .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Officials expect the Golden Gate Bridge to be swamped with an extra load of commuters , including East Bay residents making a long detour .

propbank.arg: with an extra load of commuters

example.name: arg1
example.text: I just heard ! Awesome dude ! It 's funny they would n't let us hire anyone and now they 're trying to find dayplayers to wrap a location because we 're swamped haha . See you soon buddy !
